version_description:
A variety of improvements and optimization.
Let us know what you think: hello@giftr.cool

A variety of improvements and optimization.
Let us know what you think: hello@giftr.cool

New music tool!
Unlock the whole music tool and start adding great tunes to your creations.

Improved text tool.
- Save your own text styles
- Import custom fonts within the text tool
- Install the text tool fonts to your device and make them available to other apps

Also in this update:
- Long press on any tool, style or preset to re-order or hide it.
- Now you can add Bitmoji stickers!

Let us know what you think: hello@giftr.cool

- New compelling Gradient Overlay tool. Perfect to add some depth & energy to your shots!

- Link Giftr to your Snapchat & Bitmoji account from the Settings screen to enjoy a better sharing experience.
Add Bitmoji stickers when sharing to Snapchat

- New pack of stickers: Pixel

Let us know what you think: hello@giftr.cool

- We've integrated with Unsplash
You can browse and search free high-resolution photos from Unsplash.
These can be added when you create or edit memories to spice them up!

- You can now choose which media type to export or share!

- Introducing a new auto-randomized feature!
Tap to shuffle the presets until you get the look you want.
It works within many tools including light leak, grain, gradient..

We made major changes in the core of the App to make it faster and stronger! If you find something a bit off, please tell us: hello@giftr.cool

- We've integrated with Unsplash
You can browse and search free high-resolution photos from Unsplash.
These can be added when you create or edit memories to spice them up!

- You can now choose which media type to export or share!

- Introducing a new auto-randomized feature!
Tap to shuffle the presets until you get the look you want.
It works within many tools including light leak, grain, gradient..

We made major changes in the core of the App to make it faster and stronger! If you find something a bit off, please tell us: hello@giftr.cool

- We've integrated with Unsplash
You can browse and search free high-resolution photos from Unsplash.
These can be added when you create or edit memories to spice them up!

- You can now choose which media type to export or share!

- Introducing a new auto-randomized feature!
Tap to shuffle the presets until you get the look you want.
It works within many tools including light leak, grain, gradient..

We made major changes in the core of the App to make it faster and stronger! If you find something a bit off, please tell us: hello@giftr.cool

- 12 new stickers!
- We've integrated with Unsplash
You can browse and search free high-resolution photos from Unsplash.
These can be added when you create or edit memories to spice them up!

If you have a question, contact us: hello@giftr.cool

- New media overlay tool.
It lets you overlay photos on top of others.
You can choose the shape of your overlay out of 360 styles.

- We've added many shortcuts, long press hard on items like stickers to discover them.
- Improved Snapchat & TikTok sharing.
- New pack of stickers: Black Lives Matter

If you have a question, contact us: hello@giftr.cool

- New media overlay tool.
It lets you overlay photos on top of others.
You can choose the shape of your overlay out of 360 styles.

- We've added many shortcuts, long press hard on items like stickers to discover them.
- Improved Snapchat & TikTok sharing.
- New pack of stickers: Black Lives Matter

If you have a question, contact us: hello@giftr.cool

- You can now drag & drop photos directly within the GIF maker

- New pack of stickers: Fast Food

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

If you enjoy Giftr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- Update for the new version of iOS & macOS
- You can now drag & drop photos directly within the GIF maker

- New pack of stickers: Fast Food

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

If you enjoy Giftr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- We're excited to be celebrating Halloween this year with new spooky stickers.

- 3 new tracks to add as background music.

- 16 new Color Shift modes.

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.

If you enjoy Giftr, please leave a nice review in the App Store.

- New pack of stickers: Yoga

- New awesome duo tone tool with more than 50 styles.
Great to create pop-art looks!

- Bug fixes & performance improvements.
